description: There's more work at Harrison Quaid's house for Chris Ward - and a few of his friends from the Fist for Hire Agency. After smearing Giovanni Bellini's cute ass with Crisco, Ward plunges in while Quaid cheeris him on. The young and sexy Bellini likes to give as well as receive and he finds Kelly's willing ass a home for his two fists. More guests arrive to dig at Kelly's hair-covered hole -- the voracious bottom even gets double-fisted by Mark Evrett and Nick Nicaste.
title: Fist for Hire 1
